data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Pakur, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pakur, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9,904 believers in Pakur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Pakur, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Pakur, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bedia (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, cause the 9,904 believers in Pakur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Pakur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Pakur, Jharkhand, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Pakur
location.people_groups_list: Khadura, Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Aoghar, Sauntia, Mundari
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khadura (15,000), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Aoghar (100), Sauntia (82,000), Mundari (26,000)
